title: New: Vessel –  Hold Off The Dawn (El Perro Del Mar (Original))
content:
There seems to be a culture within the world of experimental electronic music, (a stupidly vague term I know), to take tracks down off the Internet within hours of them going live.

Hopefully this wont be the fate of Vessel’s, El Perro Del Mar – Hold Off The Dawn remix. This track is fucking NASTY. Scattered, druggy and wandering, the cut manages to always hold a demonic sort of threat that makes for one uncomfortable listen. In a good way, a really good way.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
